text:
Hi. Hello! I am hungry so I am looking for
something to eat or drink. Let´s have a look

in my fridge. This is my fridge. Hmm… but…
hmmm… I don´t want anything from here because

I looked in Maggie´s fridge and she´s got
some yoghurt. Some strawberry yoghurt. Look!

Yoghurt! I like yoghurt. Should I eat some
of Maggie´s yoghurt? Yes? No. Yes? No. Yes?

Ok, but just a little. Yoghurt, yummy!
It´s delicious. Do you like yoghurt? I like

yoghurt. Yummy! So hey, what is it? It´s
yoghurt. I like yoghurt. Oh hey! Look, what´s

this? What is it? What is it? Yeah! It´s
chocolate! I like chocolate. No, it´s Maggie´s

chocolate. Maggie´s chocolate. Oh, but I
really like chocolate. No, Steve, no! It´s

not my chocolate. No. No. Say with me and
jump along. What is it? It´s chocolate. Ok,

maybe just a little.
Steve! Steve!

Oh no! Maggie´s coming.
Steve! Steve! Oh, where is Steve? Cheese!

I like cheese. Hello! Look, it´s Steve´s
cheese. Delicious. I like cheese. I´m going

to eat just a little. Yummy. Cheese.
Hey, what´s Maggie eating? What is it? It´s

cheese. It´s my cheese!
Hey, what´s that? Is it Steve? No. Look,

milk. Haha! I like milk. Yeah!
Hey, what´s Maggie drinking now? What is

it? Oh, it´s milk. It´s my milk!
Hey Steve! What are you doing?

What are you doing?!
Sorry, Steve. I´m drinking your milk and

eating your cheese.
That´s ok Maggie because I´m eating your

chocolate…
Hey!

… and your yoghurt.
We are silly.

Yes and a little naughty. Maggie, you naughty,
naughty bird.
